Package cards

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
cards.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
Class Deck Contains Methods related to card drawing, shuffling and getting Deck parameters, like it's size

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Deck()
    Empty Constructor for Discard pile, to be used on new shuffles It's empty because Discard Pile starts empty, and is populated as hands are played
    Deck​(int shoe)
    Constructor: Creates the GameDeck that will be used for the entirety of the game and instantly performs the initial shuffle

    • Deck

      public Deck​(int shoe)
      Constructor: Creates the GameDeck that will be used for the entirety of the game and instantly performs the initial shuffle
      Parameters:
      shoe - number of decks used to create the GameDeck LinkedList

    • Deck

      public Deck()
      Empty Constructor for Discard pile, to be used on new shuffles It's empty because Discard Pile starts empty, and is populated as hands are played

    • draw

      public static Card draw()
      Draw Card method: used for giving cards to both dealer and players
      Returns:
      card_out Card object that was drawn from the first position of GameDeck

      public static int deckSize()
      Deck Size Used to determine if a new shuffle is required
      Returns:
      current size of GameDeck

    • shuffle

      public static void shuffle()
      Shuffle When called, empties the DiscardDeck into the GameDeck, and shuffles the refilled GameDeck
